stories.Title: From the depths of the sea to AI
stories.Description: Stability AI has developed FreeWilly1 and FreeWilly2, two open-source large language models inspired by Microsoft's Orca, that perform exceptionally well in reasoning competitions.
stories.Tweet: From the depths of the sea to AI 📦 Stability AI has developed FreeWilly1 and FreeWilly2, two open-source large language models inspired by Microsoft's Orca, that perform exceptionally well in reasoning competitions. #ai https://www.marktechpost.com/2023/07/23/stability-ai-team-introduces-freewilly1-and-freewilly2-new-open-access-large-language-models-llms/

stories.Title: AI: Not an enemy, but an ally
stories.Description: Marc Andreessen believes that by nurturing AI interactions from an early age, children may have a personalized partner that understands their needs and supports their growth throughout life.
stories.Tweet: AI: Not an enemy, but an ally 📦 Marc Andreessen believes that by nurturing AI interactions from an early age, children may have a personalized partner that understands their needs and supports their growth throughout life. #ai https://www.businessinsider.com/ai-ally-children-grow-up-chatgpt-marc-andreessen-2023-7

stories.Title: Chrome now has Bing
stories.Description: Microsoft's Bing AI, once exclusive to the Edge browser, is expanding to Google Chrome. Users can now engage with the chatbot for a more interactive search experience.
stories.Tweet: Chrome now has Bing 📦 Microsoft's Bing AI, once exclusive to the Edge browser, is expanding to Google Chrome. Users can now engage with the chatbot for a more interactive search experience. #bing https://9to5google.com/2023/07/24/microsoft-bing-ai-google-chrome-dark-mode/

stories.Title: Great news for Android users!
stories.Description: OpenAI's ChatGPT app is heading to Google Play after impressing iOS users with half a million downloads in just six days. Pre-register now to join the AI-powered hype!
stories.Tweet: Great news for Android users! 📦 OpenAI's ChatGPT app is heading to Google Play after impressing iOS users with half a million downloads in just six days. Pre-register now to join the AI-powered hype! #chatgpt https://www.techtimes.com/articles/294146/20230722/openai-unveils-chatgpt-android-app-release-next-week-pre-register.htm

stories.Title: Introducing: FixMeBot
stories.Description: Whether you need text corrections, sentence rephrasing, or content translation, this AI-powered language assistant is set to become your greatest companion.
stories.Tweet: Introducing: FixMeBot 📦 Whether you need text corrections, sentence rephrasing, or content translation, this AI-powered language assistant is set to become your greatest companion. #ai https://www.producthunt.com/posts/fixmebot

stories.Title: Meet Worldcoin
stories.Description: Sam Altman's crypto startup aims to create a reliable way to distinguish humans from AI online. Their vision includes empowering global democratic processes and fostering economic growth.
stories.Tweet: Meet Worldcoin 📦 Sam Altman's crypto startup aims to create a reliable way to distinguish humans from AI online. Their vision includes empowering global democratic processes and fostering economic growth. #startups https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/24/worldcoin-launch-sam-altman/

stories.Title: New iPhones, new prices
stories.Description: Bloomberg's report hints at a potential price hike for the iPhone 15 Pro and Pro Max by Apple. CEO Tim Cook's earlier remarks on customers' willingness to invest more may play a role.
stories.Tweet: New iPhones, new prices 📦 Bloomberg's report hints at a potential price hike for the iPhone 15 Pro and Pro Max by Apple. CEO Tim Cook's earlier remarks on customers' willingness to invest more may play a role. #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/07/24/bloomberg-apple-raise-price-iphone-15-pro/

stories.Title: Bad news for Arcturus
stories.Description: Astranis faces setbacks as its first satellite can't deliver commercial broadband over Alaska due to solar array issues.
stories.Tweet: Bad news for Arcturus 📦 Astranis faces setbacks as its first satellite can't deliver commercial broadband over Alaska due to solar array issues. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/first-astranis-satellite-sidelined-by-post-deployment-glitch/

stories.Title: A shift in the market
stories.Description: Japanese automakers, including Toyota, feel the heat in China's fast-evolving EV landscape. Falling market share and increased competition prompt strategic changes.
stories.Tweet: A shift in the market 📦 Japanese automakers, including Toyota, feel the heat in China's fast-evolving EV landscape. Falling market share and increased competition prompt strategic changes. #toyota https://electrek.co/2023/07/24/toyota-falters-japans-ev-hesitancy-takes-toll-china/

stories.Title: Nostalgia meets innovation
stories.Description: Flippable phones are setting a new trend in the mobile world. With prices similar to standard flagship phones, they're capturing the attention of a wider audience.
stories.Tweet: Nostalgia meets innovation 📦 Flippable phones are setting a new trend in the mobile world. With prices similar to standard flagship phones, they're capturing the attention of a wider audience. #samsung https://www.theverge.com/2023/7/24/23803386/samsung-unpacked-2023-galaxy-z-flip-fold-5-motorola-razr-plus

stories.Title: Twitter continues to evolve
stories.Description: Elon Musk and CEO Linda Yaccarino announce Twitter's rebranding as "X." The blue bird logo still remains in the browser icon, but major changes are expected soon.
stories.Tweet: Twitter continues to evolve 📦 Elon Musk and CEO Linda Yaccarino announce Twitter's rebranding as "X." The blue bird logo still remains in the browser icon, but major changes are expected soon. #twitter https://www.engadget.com/twitter-begins-its-transition-to-x-100901444.html
